name: Keep Stuff Afloat
description:
How to Play
  • Things are falling from the sky
  • Keep them afloat with bubbles
  • Click anywhere on the sand to blow a bubble
  • The number of bubbles at a time is limited
  • The game is over once a thing hits the sand
  • Try to keep stuff afloat for as long as possible
Credits
  • Turisas — initial game idea
  • @y444 — implementation and such
  • All my friends who reluctantly test the game — invaluable feedback
Assets Used

The game uses third party assets:

  • Various graphical asset packs by Kenney
  • Sound effects from Audiojungle
  • Icons made by monkik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY
  • Subscribe font by Vladimir Nikolic

For assets' licences please refer to their respective web pages.

Changelog
  • February 17 2019 — the first draft release
Feeback

Is always appreciated.
